title: LF Bronze players looking to get out of bronze
body:
Hi,

I am a B4 player and I have a mate in B3. We queue together in the hopes of trying to get out of bronze but unfortunately we cannot control all factors in a game. We are looking for players to queue with us on a regular basis to climb out of bronze.

We are by no means the best players, but, we understand each role in the game. We ward strategically, and are objective driven. We are looking for like minded players who can improve and communicate in game to put together successive wins.

If this sounds like you and you are interested please add me ingame.

replies.body: I'm S5 but struggling to get points with all the feeders. Add me! :D

hey ive got this great friend called xiaoweixiao im sure hed love to boost you to challenger, otherwise i recommend watching a streamer who plays your role, i play jg so i watch alot of nightblue3 and have found ive become alot better, remember treat your team mates like 3 year olds and nevver rely on them to do anything, playing in a premade is a great idea but sometimes youll find your friends might not do too well and this can cause conflict thats why ive stuck to solo Q. add me if ya want but im legit boosted as fuk and main teeto jg, jk i play urgot.
Please add me! Bronze 5 but i'm not that bad. PatrikkStar, mainly adc and mid
hey yeah I'm keen add me in game I'm either adc mid or top
Hello there! I'm a top and jg main who plays a lot of {{champion:122}}

Bronze 4 player here struggling to get out of bronze because of my teams I'm matched with. Afk'ers/feeders.  I go in with the highest mindset and do my best, and most times carry only to be let down by my team.  I deserve to be in silver.  OceanicHayden is my LoL name.  Please add me if you're serious.  I need a duo partner or team!

Hey mowzeh,
I find a lot in climbing is having a strong mindset and not tilting in the face of losses. Like you I was Bronze last 2 seasons, slowly getting better but not out of Bronze. This season I finally got out of Bronze with consistent gameplay and always having side lanes pushing. I've discovered a few other quirks Bronze players tend to have and was able to exploit these. Perhaps I can help you, just add me.

I'm in the same boat, with many things like this, but don't que up with 5 people you end up facing other premades a fair bit, its best to just try to snowball with a combo that works, like Jungle top, or mid jungle. And apply map pressure where needed, wardings is great I'm keen to team up with you if u want to do 3s but any more than that and u get premades

i have helped many friends to silver by duoing.
Add me. At least I can spectate your games and gives you advice to get better if you are interested.
